abstract: Many gay soldiers are coming out of the closet by posting videos on YouTube to celebrate National Coming Out Day on October 11, less than one month after United States military repealed the 'don't ask, don't tell' policy.
snippet: After the repeal of “don’t ask, don’t tell,” soldiers are using YouTube to come out to the world.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: After the repeal of “don’t ask, don’t tell,” soldiers are using YouTube to come out to the world.

headline.main: Coming Out to the World on the Web
headline.print_headline: Coming Out To the World On the Web
headline.seo: After ‘Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell,’ Coming Out on the Web
